description:
Mississippi's Top Personal Injury Practice

At the Wood and Carlton, P.C. law firm in Tupelo, Mississippi, we devote our practice exclusively to helping the injured and disabled secure the finances they need to support themselves and their families.

With three law offices throughout the state, our firm offers convenient access to the highest level of advocacy and support possible to those dealing with legal challenges involving any of the following:

  • Personal injury and wrongful death claims resulting from automobile and commercial truck accidents, dangerous property conditions, and other acts of negligence
  • Medical malpractice claims
  • Workers' compensation
  • Social Security Disability

Unmatched Legal Advocacy From An Award-Winning, Highly Rated Attorney

Since our founding in 1991, we have achieved tremendous success fighting for the rights and entitlements of those in need, obtaining millions of dollars for our plaintiff clients. Combined, our attorneys possess over 75 years of legal experience, and we use a vast network of professional resources to build the strongest cases possible to help our clients recover the maximum amount of compensation possible for the damages they incurred.

Personable and compassionate, we will work closely with you to address your concerns and advise you of your options. We will then aggressively pursue the best possible outcome on your behalf whether in court or through negotiations. From this level of commitment to our clients' needs, we have earned top ratings from various peer-review sources, including attorneys who are AV Preeminent or Distinguished peer-review rated* through Martindale-Hubbell.

No Up-Front Fees And Free Consultations

To receive a free initial consolation concerning your situation, you can contact Wood and Carlton, P.C. to schedule an appointment, and we will not charge you a fee unless we secure compensation for you.

*AV速, AV Preeminent速, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell速 is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell速 Peer Review RatingTM fall into two categories - legal ability and general ethical standards.
